name: Ladderway
description:
Watch your head! In this challenging 2D retro-style arcade game, take the position of Joey and try to climb this very tall building through several different ladders while avoiding obstacles such as Mr. Mica's flowerpots, and also collecting pieces of clothes and coffee to get extra points in your run!

> Main features:
- Infinite, vertical scrolling map;
- Items to collect to increase your score;
- Items to collect to give you powerups (invincibility);
- Retro-style graphics;
- 3 lives per run and no continues;
- Progressively increasing speed and difficulty;
- High Score autosaving.
